thread.title: Fay Enders
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Fay Enders

author: Fay Enders
title: Fay Enders
text: Our trip to the outback in Australia was coordinated by Barbara Kolmegies at Goway. It was everything we hoped it would be.. We especially enjoyed the tours with the smaller groups, but all the tour guides were great and very knowledgeable. We would definitely use Goway again and would definitely recommend it to friends and family.
